reviewText:
I saw this DVD a few years back and it totally captured me. I did not personally know Bob Perry at the time but had heard many stories about him as an action bowling legend and possibly being the greatest bowler on the planet, as per Earl Anthony.

His up and down life is beyond believe but true. Upon watching the dvd I knew a book and movie would have to be made. The book is finally out and should become a best seller. The next step is for the biggest of the big movie produces and directors to turn this into a block buster motion picture, it has to happen, for sure. Cliff aka Brooklyn Butch - actionbowlers.com
